instance.context:
having or showing belief in the need for
economic_growth in addition to traditional liberalistic values ;

a political_orientation_ _in the 1960s ; blends liberal political views with an emphasis on
economic_growth ;

a government policy for maintaining
economic_growth and tax_revenues ;

economic_growth ;

economic_growth ;

a period of slow
economic_growth and high unemployment ( stagnation ) while prices rise ( inflation ) ;
